name: Community Courses
description: Community Groups are able to experience GirlVentures dynamic programming in a customized course created in partnership between the School or Community Organization and the Program Team at GirlVentures. Each course is specifically tailored to meet the interest, skill level, duration, and various needs of the group. We partner with school groups, community centers, teams, and other nonprofit organizations that work with girls, gender non-conforming youth, and/or trans youth. Community Courses are
